PrivacyPolicy.title: Privacy Policy
PrivacyPolicy.intro: Your data privacy is a fundamental right for us. Farz App is developed with the 'Privacy by Design' principle.

section1.title: 1. Data Controller and Scope
section1.content: This privacy policy applies to the Farz mobile application and website ('Service'). Our app does not require any membership system and does not store data that would directly identify you (name, surname, ID, etc.) on our servers.

section2.title: 2. Collected Data and Purpose
section2.content:
To function properly, the app locally processes the following data on your device:
- **Worship Records:** Missed prayers, fasting, and dhikr counts.
- **Location Information:** Used instantly only to calculate prayer times and find Qibla direction; not recorded.
- **Preferences:** Theme, notification, and language settings.

section3.title: 3. Data Security and Local Storage
section3.content: All your sensitive data (worship history, etc.) is stored encrypted or securely in your device's local memory (SQLite database). No automatic data transfer is made to our servers or any cloud service. The security of your data is limited to the security of your device.

section4.title: 4. Third-Party Services
section4.content: Anonymized usage statistics (e.g., crash reports) may be collected for app improvements. This data cannot be associated with your identity.

section5.title: 5. Contact
section5.content: You can contact us for your privacy questions: vatansabri@gmail.com

TermsOfService.title: Terms of Service
TermsOfService.intro: By downloading or using the Farz App, you declare that you have read, understood, and accepted this entire agreement.

section1.title: 1. Nature of Service
section1.content: Farz is software offering users helpful tools like worship tracking, time calculation, and Qibla finding. Data in the app is based on religious authority and generally accepted astronomical calculations, but 100% accuracy is not guaranteed.

section2.title: 2. User Responsibilities
section2.content: The user is obliged to verify the data produced by the app (Qibla direction, prayer times) according to local conditions. Missed prayer calculations in the app are for informational purposes; they do not substitute for a religious fatwa.

section3.title: 3. Intellectual Property Rights
section3.content: The app's design, logo, software codes, and content are protected by copyright. Unauthorized copying, reverse engineering, or commercial use is prohibited.

section4.title: 4. Disclaimer
section4.content: The developer cannot be held responsible for spiritual/material damages arising from data loss, device malfunctions, or calculation errors during the use of the app. It is recommended to note your data manually regularly.

section5.title: 5. Changes
section5.content: These terms may be changed without notice with app updates. Continuing to use the app means you accept the changes.
